name: parallel-universe
description: The set of async flow control structures and promise utils.

scripts.build: tsc && npm run rollup && npm run terser
scripts.terser: t=$(mktemp) && rm $t && for file in $(find ./lib -name '*.js'); do terser --name-cache $t --compress --mangle --mangle-props reserved=[__esModule],regex=/^__/ --output $file -- $file; done && rm $t || exit 1
scripts.docs:release: npm run docs:build && SHA=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && ORIGIN=$(git config --get remote.origin.url) && TEMP=$(mktemp -d) && FROM=$(pwd) && git clone -b ghpages --single-branch $ORIGIN $TEMP && cd $TEMP && ls -A | grep -wv .git | xargs rm -rf && cp -R $FROM/docs/ $TEMP && git add . && git commit -m "Updated docs ($SHA)" && git push && rm -rf $TEMP

author: Savva Mikhalevski <smikhalevski@gmail.com>
